name: Hivemind (Raformatico, Fran Arroyo, BuendiaGames, jjramos)
description:
HIVEMIND

Being an insect wasn't bad.

I lived day to day with my comrades, all for one and one for all.

But evolution was capricious and decided to play with me.

I evolved, losing the connection with the HIVEMIND. Now, I can't understand the rest of the insects. They can't understand me either. Although with a lot of concentration i can connect with them at a basic level.

I hope to collect enough lymph to make a decent offering to "Mother Bug"...

... Only she can undo my curse and connect me back to HIVEMIND.

Please, Mother Bug... hear my prayers!

'○.○'

Discover this world, help "Bugatti" to explore and find enough yellow balls "lymph" and climb to the sacred portal in Mother Bug's mountain to complete the adventure!

Mouse & Keyboard:  w/a/s/d (move) ·  w/a/s/d + shift (run) ·  spacebar (jump) · LMB (fly) · RMB (connect) · mouselook (free view) · RMB + mouselook (interact).

Gamepad:  L stick button (move) · L stick button + RT (run) · A (jump) · X (fly) · RB (connect) · RSB (free view) · RB + RSB (interact).

We are a spanish team and this is our submission for Game Off 2021. Hope you like it!!
